channel.title: Possible stupid question
channel.description: ok so im like completely new to this whole thing with coding and such, but decided im tierd of a few things in some of the servers ive downloaded. So i decided ill change them but have no clue what to use to edit dats or format a new code into a date file for the server to read. so if anyone can point me in the right direction even to the correct tutorial.. id appreciate it a lot.. thanks in advance.

item.title: Possible stupid question
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

when your editing your source its all in java so you will need to read your source only in a computer language. Bruce Eckle wrote a book on how to read java and the download to the book is here http://www.codeguru.com/java/tij/ or you can just learn on your own and read the source, understand it, and code it. and when you edit it you edit it as a java file
